scripts.build:extension: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; rm -rf dist/extension dist/pdp-rewriter-extension.zip; mkdir -p dist/extension; rsync -a --exclude node_modules/ packages/extension/ dist/extension/; (cd dist/extension && zip -qr ../pdp-rewriter-extension.zip .); echo Built dist/pdp-rewriter-extension.zip'
